    An enumeration of supported calendar periods used in savings.
    SavingsAccountTransactionType
    An enumeration of different transactions that can occur on a SavingsAccount.
    SavingsCompoundingInterestPeriodType
    The compounding interest period is the span of time at the end of which savings in a client's account earn interest.
    SavingsInterestCalculationDaysInYearType
    People typically use either of the following settings when calculating there interest using the daily method: 360 and 365
    SavingsInterestCalculationType
    There are two methods to calculate the interest on a savings account: The daily balance method; and The average daily balance method.
    SavingsPeriodFrequencyType
    An enumeration of supported calendar periods used in savings.
    SavingsPostingInterestPeriodType
    The interest posting period is the span of time at the end of which savings earned but not yet credited/posted in a client's account is credited/posted.
    SavingsWithdrawalFeesType
